author: Niamh Cahill
title: Irish doctors on getting Covid-19: ‘In 90 minutes, I deteriorated quite rapidly’
description: An anaesthetist and a GP recount their experiences after contracting coronavirus
content:
One in four people infected by Covid-19 in Ireland are healthcare workers, figures have shown. A breakdown of this cohort last week showed 25 per cent of these were doctors.
Two such frontline workers who were infected by the novel coronavirus spoke to The I… [+6147 chars]
